name: Laser Cats: To The Point
description:
Cats? Danger! Lasers? Adventure!

Welcome to Laser Cats: To The Point. The only game about leading cats to safety where you only control a super sweet laser pointer.

Controls:

  • Just move the mouse around. Like a boss!

PxlJam 2018 entry made by:

  • Kunyang Ji
  • Ryan Stark
  • James Brown
  • Olivier Chrun
